annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Aug. 7, 1980, D.C. Law 3-81, § 2(j), 27 DCR 2632

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary repeal of section, see § 2(f) of the Legal Service Establishment Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-620, January 22, 1999, 46 DCR 1343).
